description: Create and manage polls for your community to participate in
existing-description: Here you can view and manage all polls created on your forum
no-polls: No polls have been created yet
poll-title-placeholder: Enter a clear and engaging poll title
poll-title-help: This will be displayed as the main heading of your poll
poll-description-placeholder: Provide additional context or instructions for voters
poll-description-help: Optional description to help users understand the poll better
poll-options-help: Add at least 2 options for users to choose from
allow-multiple-votes: Allow users to select multiple options
start-date-help: When should this poll become active?
end-date-help: When should this poll close? (Leave blank for no end date)
